name: Ranchan Recreational Park (Ranchan Pool)
features: A popular spot featuring a picturesque waterfall, picnic areas, and walking trails amidst lush greenery. Ideal for family outings and nature enthusiasts.
address: Approximately 5 km from Serian town center

name: Silabur Cave
features: A limestone cave known for its impressive stalactites and stalagmites. Adventurous visitors can explore its chambers and enjoy the surrounding forest.
address: Near Kampung Lobang Batu, about 30 minutes from Serian town

name: Simuja Waterfall
features: A serene waterfall nestled in the forest, offering a tranquil setting for relaxation.
